Name: Forsake Your Humanity
Lore: A dark spell that harnesses the twisted arcane to convert mana into soul essences, trading ethereal energy for the most elusive of powers at the cost of one's own humanity.
Lore2: Legend speaks of a heretic who dared to meddle with the soulstream, invoking a spell that blurred the line between essence and void, bestowing upon mortals the power to shape souls.

Name: Lesser Replenishment
Lore: A basic spell taught to novice healers. It mends minor wounds by knitting flesh and bone with a gentle warmth.
Lore2: In the earliest days of the Circle of Healers, an unassuming apprentice stumbled upon this spell within the Grove of Life, changing the fate of many.

Name: Greater Replenishment
Lore: A more potent version of the heal spell, used on the battlefields to save knights and warriors from the brink of death.
Lore2: Crafted by the battlefield medics of the Eternal War, this spell was a light of hope amid the shadow of unending conflict.

Name: Nourishing Heal
Lore: The pinnacle of healing magic, this spell can bring back a warrior standing at death's door, fully restoring their vitality.
Lore2: This rare art was said to be the gift of the Phoenix, shared only with those who found favor with the immortal bird.

Name: Lesser Flame Orb
Lore: A classic spell of the arcane, conjuring a sphere of blazing fire that is hurled at enemies, leaving nothing but ashes.
Lore2: Born from the primal fear of darkness, this spell was the first conjured by the ancient pyromancers to light the night.

Name: Dark Flame Arc
Lore: An advanced fire spell that releases a sweeping arc of flames, engulfing multiple foes in a fierce inferno.
Lore2: A vengeful wizard who danced with shadows created this spell to scorch his enemies with the dark fires of the abyss.

Name: Wrath of the Dark Soul
Lore: A forbidden spell that channels the caster's life force into a devastating explosion of dark energy, feared by all.
Lore2: Only the forbidden tomes speak of this spell, and it is said that its origin lies in the cursed Soulwell where no light can reach.

Name: Sacred Soul Grasp
Lore: An enchantment that disrupts the flow of magic around the target, leaving them incapacitated and vulnerable to attack.
Lore2: This ancient rite was discovered inscribed in the ruins of a temple dedicated to the Watchers of Equilibrium, keepers of peace between realms.

Name: Dark Soul Crush
Effect: Causes the enemy to hurt itself for 50% of its normal damage
Lore: A dark enchantment that preys on the fears of its target, causing them to turn against themselves in terror.
Lore2: From the depths of the Nightmare Chasm, this curse was extracted by a cult that whispered to the darkness.

Name: Twisted Soul Manipulation
Effect: 30% chance for the enemy to heal the player for 45 hp; 30% chance the enemy to deal triple its damage to the user; 40% chance for the enemy to hurt itself for triple its damage
Lore: A chaotic spell that scrambles the thoughts of its target, making friend seem like foe and reality a mere suggestion.
Lore2: Originating from the Mad Oracle of Delphi, this spell is laced with the same madness that consumed its creator.

Name: Fear the Unseen Predator
Effect: Causes the player to go immune for 3 turns
Lore: An ancient hunter's enchantment, granting the caster the ability to blend with their surroundings and become invisible to their prey.
Lore2: Once a secret of the elite Shadowstalkers, this enchantment was used to hunt the most elusive beasts in the Great Dark Woods.
